DOC.detailed_description: Objective : The aim study determine serum concentration adiponectin ( ApN ) , leptin ghrelin different stage anorectic patient evaluate relationship biochemical , hormonal anthropometric parameter . Design : The study group compose four group . Group1 : Treatment-naïve patient recent diagnosis AN ( n:19 ) , Group 2 : The weight recover ( 10 % increase body weight compare baseline weight ) subgroup group 1 end mean 117.72±98.14 day follow-up ( n : 12 ) , Group 3 : Recovered patient previous history AN normal menstrual cycle body weight present time ( n:10 ) , Group 4 : Control group : constitutionally thin healthy young woman normal menstrual cycle ( n:10 ) . Venous blood obtain measurement biochemical parameter , ApN , leptin ghrelin body composition determine bioimpedance analysis .
